snippet.title: Eternal Exodus // spring 2022 trailer
snippet.description:
Pokemon gameplay meets Final Fantasy story/worldbuilding, with fusion, crafting, and a fully original soundtrack.  Coming to PC and all consoles.  Kickstarter July 15, 2022: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/fordesoft/eternal-exodus-monstertaming-jrpg-with-crafting-and-fusion/
http://eternalexodus.com/
Please help by wishlisting @ https://store.steampowered.com/app/1009410/Eternal_Exodus/
